about.name: Caroline Aimé
about.my-work: I have been working in massage since 2010, training first in well-being and then in therapy.
about.techniques: Various techniques, such as relaxation, palpatory anatomy as well as different types of massage, such as visceral, detoxifying and Ayurvedic massage, which I learnt in India, have led me to acquire a particular dexterity and a knack for reading bodies.
about.passionate: Passionate about my work, I have been privileged enough to work in prestigious establishments throughout the world and in private clinics in Switzerland. From there, I developed a desire to explore a more subtle and emotional approach thanks to Sophrology. I qualified at the Swiss school of Caycedian Sophrology, and am now able to offer you personalized support based on our dual aspects : mind and body.

home.name: Caroline Aimé
home.practice: Independent practice in Sophrology and Massage in Crozet
home.offer: Come and discover my practice, get your first 30 minutes customized intuitive massage for free.

massages.bespoke: Bespoke massage, tailored to your individual needs
massages.ayurvedic-technique: Whole body massage inspired by Indian medical techniques. The Ayurvedic treatment aims at balancing and harmonizing body and soul

sophrology.what-description: Essentially it is a dual bodily and psychological approach inspired by both Oriental (yoga, zen, …) and Western (relaxation) techniques. The aim is global well-being and individual harmony.
sophrology.who-description: Basically for everyone encountering anxiety, poor self-esteem, or experiencing negative emotions in anticipation of situations that we cannot avoid.
sophrology.offer: I offer you a customized care plan, creating a bespoke protocol according to your needs.
sophrology.duration: A Sophrology session lasts between 60 and 90 minutes.

contact.contact-text: You can contact me by email, WhatsApp or text message and I will revert asap.
